summary: Encapsulates configurable regridding strategies for storage‑coefficient related fields, allowing users to specify the regridder type and aggregation method for each variable (convertible, storage coefficient, specific yield) when transforming data onto a new grid.
business_intent: Enable flexible, user‑defined grid interpolation of hydraulic storage parameters in MODFLOW‑6 models, supporting custom overlap or barycentric methods to improve model setup and data consistency.
